question.questionText: The graph illustrates the percentage of the population in four European countries who used the internet between 2010 and 2020. Summarise the information by selecting and reporting the main features.

answer: The line graph compares the proportion of people using the internet in Germany, the UK, Spain, and France over a decade. It is immediately apparent that all four countries experienced a significant increase in internet usage. The UK consistently had the highest percentage, while France started the lowest but showed rapid growth.

overallScore.summary: An excellent and comprehensive report with a very clear overview and well-supported details.

criteriaScores.name: Task Achievement (TA)
criteriaScores.summary: All key features and trends are clearly presented and well-illustrated with data.

criteriaScores.name: Coherence & Cohesion (CC)
criteriaScores.summary: Information is logically sequenced and very easy to follow.

criteriaScores.name: Lexical Resource (LR)
criteriaScores.summary: A wide range of sophisticated vocabulary is used accurately and effectively.

criteriaScores.name: Grammatical Range & Accuracy (GRA)
criteriaScores.summary: A wide range of structures are used with full flexibility and accuracy.

paragraphAnalysis.originalText: It is immediately apparent that all four countries experienced a significant increase in internet usage. The UK consistently had the highest percentage, while France started the lowest but showed rapid growth.
paragraphAnalysis.comments: This is a perfect overview. It identifies the overall trend (increase for all) and presents the two most significant features (UK highest, France's rapid growth) without giving specific data, which is exactly what's required.
paragraphAnalysis.howToRewrite: A cursory glance at the graph reveals two principal features. Firstly, there was a substantial rise in internet penetration across all four nations over the specified period. Secondly, while the United Kingdom consistently maintained the highest proportion of internet users, France, despite starting from the lowest base, demonstrated the most dramatic growth.
